entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch looked furious, indicating that he is an important character in the scene.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman got to his feet and bowed, beaming, suggesting that he is a significant figure in the story.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore was sitting down as Bagman walked out of the dungeon, indicating his importance in the scene.

entities.name: rookwood
entities.description: Rookwood is mentioned as someone who got Mr. Crouch a job, suggesting that he has some influence or connection to Mr. Crouch.

relationships.description: Mr. Crouch spat at Dumbledore, and then Bagman walked out of the dungeon, suggesting that they are associated with each other.
Mr. Crouch referred to Rookwood as someone who got him a job, indicating that he is employed by or connected to Rookwood.
